name: Halo: Combat Evolved
notes: Requires product key. Official No-CD patch installed automatically.

insert-disc.message: Mount the Halo Combat Evolved CD to continue

task.description: Running setup. Use Express install, and close when it asks if you want to launch.
task.name: wineexec

task.description: Installing No-CD official patch from drive_c/Program Files/Microsoft Games/Halo/haloupdate.exe
task.name: wineexec

content:
game:
  arch: win32
  exe: drive_c/Program Files/Microsoft Games/Halo/halo.exe
  prefix: $GAMEDIR
installer:
- insert-disc:
    message: Mount the Halo Combat Evolved CD to continue
    requires: Setup.Exe
- task:
    arch: win32
    name: create_prefix
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
- task:
    app: mfc42
    description: Installing mfc42
    name: winetricks
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
- task:
    description: Running setup. Use Express install, and close when it asks if you
      want to launch.
    executable: $DISC/Setup.Exe
    name: wineexec
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
- task:
    description: Installing No-CD official patch from drive_c/Program Files/Microsoft
      Games/Halo/haloupdate.exe
    executable: $GAMEDIR/drive_c/Program Files/Microsoft Games/Halo/haloupdate.exe
    name: wineexec
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
